detail_desc: Hipster briefs in microfibre and lace with a mid waist, lined gusset, narrow sides and cutaway coverage at the back.
Round-necked T-shirts in soft organic cotton jersey. Regular Fit.
Round-necked T-shirts in soft organic cotton jersey. Regular Fit.
Vest top in jersey crêpe with scalloped trims.
Vest tops in stretch cotton jersey. Regular Fit.
Vest tops in stretch cotton jersey. Regular Fit.
Vest tops in stretch cotton jersey. Regular Fit.
Vest tops in stretch cotton jersey. Regular Fit.
Vest tops in stretch cotton jersey. Regular Fit.
Vest tops in stretch cotton jersey. Regular Fit.

Shorts in a viscose and cotton weave containing some linen with a high paper bag waist and fly with a concealed zip. Pleats at the top, a detachable tie belt, side pockets and short legs with sewn-in turn-ups. Unlined.
5-pocket, slim-fit shorts in washed stretch denim with hard-worn details, an adjustable elasticated waist (in sizes 8-12Y) and zip fly with a button.
Off-the-shoulder dress woven in a cotton blend with concealed elastication and a wide flounce at the top. Concealed zip in one side, a seam at the waist and flared skirt. Unlined.
5-pocket, low-rise shorts in washed denim with hard-worn details, a button fly and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems.
5-pocket, low-rise shorts in washed denim with hard-worn details, a button fly and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems.
Shorts in soft jersey with side pockets and wide elastication with smocking at the waist for a more comfortable fit.
Shorts in soft jersey with side pockets and wide elastication with smocking at the waist for a more comfortable fit.

Shirt in soft twill with a brushed finish. Turn-down collar, classic front, open chest pocket, long sleeves with buttoned cuffs, and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back. Regular fit – a classic fit with good room for movement over the shoulders and chest to create a comfortable, tailored silhouette.

Shirt in soft twill with a brushed finish. Turn-down collar, classic front, open chest pocket, long sleeves with buttoned cuffs, and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back. Regular fit – a classic fit with good room for movement over the shoulders and chest to create a comfortable, tailored silhouette.
Dress in a viscose weave with a small stand-up collar with gathers and a V-neck opening at the front. Concealed hook-and-eye fasteners, short raglan sleeves and a rounded hem. Unlined.
Dress in a viscose weave with a small stand-up collar with gathers and a V-neck opening at the front. Concealed hook-and-eye fasteners, short raglan sleeves and a rounded hem. Unlined.
Dress in a viscose weave with a small stand-up collar with gathers and a V-neck opening at the front. Concealed hook-and-eye fasteners, short raglan sleeves and a rounded hem. Unlined.

Padded softshell jacket in windproof, water-repellent functional fabric with folded seams, a detachable hood and fleece-lined, stand-up collar. Zip down the front, zipped front pockets with taped seams and ribbed cuffs. Lined. The jacket has a water-repellent coating without fluorocarbons.
Tunic in an airy, striped weave with an opening and twisted ties at the top, long sleeves with buttoned cuffs and decorative embroidery at the hem. Unlined.

Knee-length dress in a viscose weave with inset hole embroidery, a round neckline and an opening with a button at the top. Long sleeves with elastication at the cuffs, and a seam with a drawstring and tasselled ties at the waist. Unlined.
Trousers in an airy viscose weave with an elasticated waist, side pockets and straight, wide legs.
Top in soft, patterned viscose jersey with an opening at the top and narrow ties at the neckline. Short, flounced sleeves with smocking over the shoulders, and gathers in the side seams for best fit.
Top in soft, patterned viscose jersey with an opening at the top and narrow ties at the neckline. Short, flounced sleeves with smocking over the shoulders, and gathers in the side seams for best fit.
Top in soft, patterned viscose jersey with an opening at the top and narrow ties at the neckline. Short, flounced sleeves with smocking over the shoulders, and gathers in the side seams for best fit.
Top in slub jersey made from a modal and cotton blend with a lace-trimmed, wrapover V-neck and a seam under the bust with a braided tie belt with tassels at the ends.
Shorts in woven fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist, fake fly, side pockets and a fake welt back pocket.
Shorts in woven fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist, fake fly, side pockets and a fake welt back pocket.
Shorts in woven fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist, fake fly, side pockets and a fake welt back pocket.
T-shirt in soft cotton jersey with a print motif. Short sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups and gathered side seams for a more comfortable fit.

Jumpsuit in woven fabric with a lace layer at the top and an opening with a covered button at the back of the neck. Dropped shoulders, wide 3/4-length sleeves with raw, scalloped edges, and side pockets. Seam at the waist and a concealed zip and hook-and-eye fasteners at the back. Partly lined.
Off-the-shoulder top in stretch viscose jersey with wide smocking at the top and short sleeves.
Off-the-shoulder top in stretch viscose jersey with wide smocking at the top and short sleeves.
Short-sleeved wrap dress in woven fabric with flounces. V-neck, a concealed hook-and-eye at the top and an elasticated seam and detachable tie belt at the waist. Unlined.
Short-sleeved wrap dress in woven fabric with flounces. V-neck, a concealed hook-and-eye at the top and an elasticated seam and detachable tie belt at the waist. Unlined.

Checked shirt in crisp cotton poplin with a button-down collar, classic front and open chest pocket. Long sleeves with adjustable buttoning at the cuffs, a yoke with a pleat and hanger loop at the back, and a rounded hem. Regular fit – a classic fit with good room for movement and a gently shaped waist to create a comfortable, tailored silhouette.

Checked shirt in crisp cotton poplin with a button-down collar, classic front and open chest pocket. Long sleeves with adjustable buttoning at the cuffs, a yoke with a pleat and hanger loop at the back, and a rounded hem. Regular fit – a classic fit with good room for movement and a gently shaped waist to create a comfortable, tailored silhouette.
5-pocket, ankle-length jeans with a high, asymmetric waist, zip fly and button and straight-cut, slightly wider legs with raw-edge frayed hems.
Calf-length dress in a patterned crêpe weave with a V-neck, narrow adjustable shoulder straps and slits front and back. Unlined.

Calf-length dress in a patterned crêpe weave with an opening and button at the back of the neck. Long sleeves with gathers at the shoulders and ribbing at the cuffs, and a seam at the hem with a wide asymmetric flounce. Unlined.
Straight-cut denim jacket with a collar, buttons down the front and flap chest pockets. Embroidered text motif on the back, dropped shoulders, buttoned cuffs and a frayed raw-edge hem.
Calf-length skirt in a crêpe weave with a high waist, concealed zip in one side and asymmetric hem. Short inner skirt.
Cropped top in jersey with a small stand-up collar, zip at the top and glittery elastic hem.
Shorts in jersey and sequin-embroidered mesh with a high, elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets and short legs.
Cap in cotton twill with embroidered text. Adjustable tab and clip fastener at the back.
Waist bag in woven fabric with sequins, a zip at the front and an adjustable waist strap with a plastic fastener. Lined. Size approx. 14x16x30 cm.
Short shorts with an elasticated drawstring waist and colourful side stripes.
Short shorts with an elasticated drawstring waist and colourful side stripes.
Short-sleeved bodysuits in soft, printed cotton jersey with press-studs at the crotch.
Short-sleeved bodysuits in soft, printed cotton jersey with press-studs at the crotch.

Set with a vest top, pair of shorts and hooded jacket in soft cotton jersey. Vest top with a print motif on the front and press-stud on one shoulder. Patterned shorts with an elasticated waist and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems. Jacket with a jersey-lined hood, zip down the front and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Ribbed vest top in soft cotton jersey with overlocked edges at the armholes and hem.
Ribbed vest top in soft cotton jersey with overlocked edges at the armholes and hem.
Jumper in a soft cotton knit with a high, ribbed stand-up collar and zip at the top. Long sleeves, and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Jumper in a soft cotton knit with a high, ribbed stand-up collar and zip at the top. Long sleeves, and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.

Leggings in imitation leather with a glossy finish. Concealed elastication at the waist.
Long-sleeved top in soft cotton jersey with buttons on one shoulder and a chest pocket.
Short-sleeved polo shirt in cotton piqué with a ribbed collar, button placket, small embroidery detail on the chest and short slits in the sides. Slightly longer at the back.

Jazz trousers in cotton jersey with an elasticated waist and flared legs.
Scarf in woven fabric with a brushed finish. Fringes along the short sides.
